transcript:
Customer: Hare Krishna Hare Krishna

Hello?
Executive: Yes, Kusum baat kar rahi hu mai IndiaMART se swagat hai sir. Aapne sir dobara se consult kiya tha video meeting ke regarding?
Customer: Ha wo dusre number me lage na madam ek number aur diya hua hai aapke pass.
Executive: Please usme laga lijiye number.
Customer: Sir maine ek baat kar li unse guide bhi kar diya application kaise use karna hai.
Executive: Aaj kar diya hai?
Executive: Dobara nahi karna hota na sir. Teen char din continuously wo services use karenge uske baad humko unko feedback chahiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo nahi bol raha hu aaj aapne diya hai usko video me.
Executive: Madam subah call kiya wo bol rahe hai ke hum busy hai isme se zyada by use me consumption nahi kar payi hu baki meri sales se koi call nahi kiya gaya hai. To aap ek bar employee ke sath coordinate kar lijiye sir is cheez ko regarding.
Customer: Rukiye hum puchte hai hua nahi hua.
Executive: Yes, employee ko call break karenge na.
Customer: Ha bilkul kar sakte hai sir. Mai lekin wo aap mere number pe connect kijiye.
Customer: Aap usi number usi number pe dusre number me baat kiya kijiye na jo bhi problem hota hai na. Ye sale ka bhi jo bhi baat hota hai wo dusre number me kar lijiye na please.
Executive: Are sir wo bol rahe hai ke mere ko koi conversation hi nahi karna hai aur ye interest aapke side se raise kiya gaya hai video meeting ke regarding.
Customer: Nahi to dono number hai na hamara to ek hi number se jayega to usme baat karne ke liye bol raha hu mai.
Customer: Accha rukiye mujhe samajh ke mai phone karta hu aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says executive called on wrong number.

- Customer says sales team not calling back.

- Customer says they don't want conversation.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to coordinate with employee.

- Executive said they will call employee.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will understand and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, sales, coordination, numbers
